Description: Round-topped limestone stela; nine rows of Hieroglyphic text above of scene of the deceased seated before an offering-table, four female figures to the right.
Curator's comments: Freed, R E, 1996 in Fs. Simpson, p. 312
Bibliographic references: Scott-Moncrieff 1912 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 2. (pl.34)
